Objective: 
 The goal of the game is to turn off all the lights on the board.


Gameplay: 
Clicking a cell toggles the light for that cell and its adjacent cells. The game is won when all lights on the board are turned off.

Welcome to our collection of fun and challenging mini-games! 
 This guide will help you understand the basic rules and mechanics of each game so you can start playing and having fun.


Navigation:
 The main screen of the app displays a list of available games.
 Simply tap on start option, select game you can start playing.


Settings:
 The settings menu allows you to customize the app to your preferences .


View Score:
 The leaderboard displays the high scores of all players who have played the games.
 You can filter the leaderboard by game and by time period.
 To add your score to the leaderboard, simply play a game and achieve a high score.


We hope you enjoy our collection of mini-games and have fun playing them!

Objective: 
 The goal of the game is to combine tiles with the same number to create a tile with the number 2048.


Gameplay: 
 Swipe the tiles to move them in any direction. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. After each move, a new tile will appear on the board. Keep combining tiles until you create a tile with the number 2048.


Scoring: 
 Your score is based on the value of the tiles you combine. Each time you combine two tiles, their value is added to your score. The game ends when you reach 2048, or when you can no longer make a move.
